The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
A summary of reviews will appear here.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#27596](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27596) (assumeutxo (2) by jamesob)
* [#27491](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27491) (refactor: Move chain constants to the util library by TheCharlatan)
* [#26022](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26022) (Add util::ResultPtr class by ryanofsky)
* [#19461](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19461) (multiprocess: Add bitcoin-gui -ipcconnect option by ryanofsky)
* [#19460](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19460) (multiprocess: Add bitcoin-wallet -ipcconnect option by ryanofsky)
* [#10102](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10102) (Multiprocess bitcoin by ryanofsky)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Updated 9d3918d47daf7b118507ea6db0dcef69cedf7005 -> ebc493e94bbc43b6611b7211b77c12c453171ce9 ([`pr/bresult-opt.1`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/bresult-opt.1) -> [`pr/bresult-opt.2`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/bresult-opt.2), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/bresult-opt.1..pr/bresult-opt.2)) to fix CI compile error https://cirrus-ci.com/task/6195420723412992?logs=ci#L2419
Rebased ebc493e94bbc43b6611b7211b77c12c453171ce9 -> f1a9c713540b3f00cea3c29ace4958b77390a8ef ([`pr/bresult-opt.2`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/bresult-opt.2) -> [`pr/bresult-opt.3`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/bresult-opt.3), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/bresult-opt.2-rebase..pr/bresult-opt.3)) on top of pr/bresult2.24 to fix conflicts in base PR #25665
Rebased f1a9c713540b3f00cea3c29ace4958b77390a8ef -> fb94363ba45acd0b5ca702a60f41533a7b3fbec4 ([`pr/bresult-opt.3`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/bresult-opt.3) -> [`pr/bresult-opt.4`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/bresult-opt.4), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/bresult-opt.3-rebase..pr/bresult-opt.4)) due to conflict with #25667
Rebased fb94363ba45acd0b5ca702a60f41533a7b3fbec4 -> 080268dc424301198ae93c3d002c13dfbfe6b9c9 ([`pr/bresult-opt.4`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/bresult-opt.4) -> [`pr/bresult-opt.5`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/bresult-opt.5), [compare](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/compare/pr/bresult-opt.4-rebase..pr/bresult-opt.5)) due to conflict with #26251 and #26286
